mainMenu.mytask: All the tasks assigned to you
mainMenu.process: Page need to be filled for travel and expense management
mainMenu.myClaim: list of all the submitted claim requests
mainMenu.submitClaimRequest: You can reimburse the money through this use case
mainMenu.submitTravelRequest: You can disburse amount before travelling through this use case

taskMenu.groupTask: Process to reimbursed the money through use case submit claim /travel request approval

forms.mains: Details about travel and claim request
forms.documents: Add any relevant documents about the request
forms.notes: Add any relevant notes about the request
forms.history: view the status of your request
forms.action: Take a decision on the request
forms.remarks: Write up regarding the travel/claim request
forms.advance: Request for an advance amount while travel request use case
forms.addBank: You can add on the bank details for the claim request
